Class Application

java.lang.Object
sg.edu.ntu.sc2002.ay2425.fcsdGroup2.model.entities.Application
public class Application extends Object
Represents an application made by an HDB applicant for a BTO project. Tracks the application status, flat type selection, and booking information.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Constructs a new Application instance.

    • Application

      public Application(int id, HDBApplicant applicant, BTOProj project)
      Constructs a new Application instance.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique application ID
      applicant - the applicant making the application
      project - the project the applicant is applying for

  • Method Details

      Approves the application and updates status to SUCCESSFUL.

    • reject

      public void reject()
      Rejects the application and updates status to UNSUCCESSFUL.

    • booked

      public void booked()
      Marks the application as BOOKED after successful flat selection.

      Returns the flat booked by the applicant.
      Returns:
      booked flat

    • requestWithdrawal

      public void requestWithdrawal()
      Requests withdrawal from the project. Changes status to WITHDRAW_REQ while remembering previous status.

    • approveWithdrawal

      public void approveWithdrawal()
      Approves the withdrawal request. Changes status to WITHDRAWN.

    • rejectWithdrawal

      public void rejectWithdrawal()
      Rejects the withdrawal request and restores previous status.

      Returns the current status name as a string.
